name: Make-Up Touch Themes - Makeup Christmas Games
name_original: Make-Up Touch Themes - Makeup Christmas Games
description:
***Over 1+ Million Downloads!*** Help the model look beautiful! Become the best make up artist as you style the glamorous model!! All makeover themes are unlocked for endless design options!

**Themes**
Colorful Rainbow Salon: Choose from the brightest rainbow colors! Pick your hair, earrings and then finish with colorful make up!

Classic Style: Create a perfect look by choosing from modern make up and classic style choices. Apply lipstick, eye-shadow, eye-liner and much more!

Christmas Beauty: Go to the Christmas Salon for a Holiday makeover! Create the best look for the holidays with many fun options!

Metallic Salon: Choose from bold colors and fashionable make up choices! Add lots of silver, bronze and platinum colors!

Sparkle & Glitter: Create the best sparkle designs with glitter make up, sparkly earrings and many unique colors.

Winter Princess Beauty: Choose from beautiful princess hairstyles including pink, purple and blue! Add diamond earrings and apply frosty make up!

**Features**
- Apply Make Up by using your finger! Hold and drag the make up tools to create the perfect look!
- Change Hair Styles and Colors!
- Add fashionable earrings!
- Endless combinations possible!
- Use the Reset button to style again

*Please note that Glam Beauty School Make Up is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Ninjafish Studios is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.

Terms Of Service: http://www.ninjafish.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://www.ninjafish.com/privacy
